shrimp.name: WardAniso
shrimp.description: Greg Ward Larson anisotropic shading model
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: uroughness
input.description: The apparent roughness of the surface in xdir.

input.name: vroughness
input.description: The apparent roughness of the surface in a tangent perpendicular to xdir

shrimp.usage: Gregory J. Ward's anisotropic specular term. Uroughness and Vroughness control the apparent surface roughness in the anisotropy direction, and anisotropy perpendicular direction dir, which defaults to dPdv. The specular color value is passed to aov_specularcolor, while the specular value, to the aov_specular AOV presets.
